RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 1 7 1/2F Turf CR: 70. Claiming Purse 18000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming races for $12,500 or less not considered in es timating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOTTA ROSES went four wide on the first turn, stalked the pace, bid five wide leaving the turn, closed willingly, got up late and was all out at the wire. BIA BOLT RUNNER was unhurried early and trailed the field, saved ground, bid along the rail on the turn, altered course mid stretch, surged late and was gaining ground. SEQUAYA vied throughout and was outfinished in a game effort. GOTTA B KITTEN ME vied inside to the final strides and was outclosed in a good effort. INEEDAGIRLLIKEYOU raced in the back, rallied on the far turn, closed steadily and gained late to improve position. SANGFROID stalked the pace in an inside trip, bid along the rail to loom a threat, hung late and fell back. SUNSET PAYNTER broke in the air, advanced on the turn, bid six wide and had nothing left for the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Sangfroid
ENTRY.OWNER: Irion Heather and Kaufmann Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, bid rail turn, loomed a threat, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Gotta B Kitten Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside to final strides, outclosed, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Sequaya
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied throughout, outfinished, game effort

ENTRY.NAME: Bia Bolt Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, bid rail turn, angled out, surged, gaining late

ENTRY.NAME: Sunset Paynter
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in air, advanced turn, 6wide into stretch, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Lotta Roses
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4wide 1st turn, staked pace, 5wide into stretch, up late, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Ineedagirllikeyou
ENTRY.COMMENT: in the back, rallied 2nd turn, steady close, late gain,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250 (Claiming races for $4,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOURBON TEDDY set the pace, was under pressure late and just lasted at the wire. BERNIE LOMAX stalked the pace three wide, closed steadily, was gaining fast late and was outnodded to just miss. UNCLE NICK was slow early, went six wide leaving the turn and finished well to get up for show. LIMA ZULU raced between horses to the turn, stalked the pace, dropped back entering the stretch, leveled off and lost position. OVER CALENDARED stalked the pace along the inside, was crowded and checked entering the turn and dropped back. TEA AFTER BALLET lost his footing and was steadied at the start, saved ground in an even effort and was outrun. The rider of OVER CALENDARED lodged an objection against the rider of LIME ZULU for alleged interference entering the turn. No change was made.

ENTRY.NAME: Tea After Ballet
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost footing, steadied start, saved ground, even effort, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Over Calendared
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva and Hooves and Saddles LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, crowded, checked into turn, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Nick
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 6wide leaving turn, finished well, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Lima Zulu
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, fell back leaving turn, leveled off, lost position

ENTRY.NAME: Bernie Lomax
ENTRY.OWNER: H Third Equine LLC M T of Lemont LLC and Phillip Sagan Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3w, steady close, wearing down rival, gaining,just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Teddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, under pressure late, just lasted,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 3 7 1/2F Turf CR: 83. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,500 (Claiming races for $6,250 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: APRIL'S GEM got away well, vied inside while racing in hand, assumed command into the turn, drew clear and held safely under mild urging. COMMAND POINT dropped inside on the first turn, saved ground, bid along the rail on the second turn, bid, hung late and was no match for the winner. ROMANTIC ATTACK stalked the pace, went three wide into the second turn, bid five wide entering the stretch, came up empty late and settled for show. ZENCHUA SKY raced mid pack along the inside, bid between horses into the turn, fell back and finished evenly. EMBARRASSING was rated back at the start, dropped inside, bid along the rail on the second turn, altered course and lacked a rally. NORTHERN ALLIANCE was never far back, raced outside in an even effort and failed to threaten. SENSE OF SELF set a pressured pace to the second turn, tired and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Zenchua Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack inside, bid between into turn, fell back, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: April's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside in hand, took over into turn, drew clear, held safe

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Tony Holmes & Dr. & Mrs. Walter Zent

ENTRY.NAME: Sense of Self
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace to 2nd turn, tired, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Embarrassing
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated back start, dropped inside, bid rail turn, altered course,

ENTRY.NAME: Romantic Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3wide into 2nd turn, 5wide into stretch, empty late

ENTRY.NAME: Command Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped inside, saved ground, bid rail turn, hung late, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Alliance
ENTRY.OWNER: Donovitch Kevin W Rodriguez Eduardo M and Joy Kyle S
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, raced outside, even effort, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 93. Starter Allowance Purse 20500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE AUGUST 23, 2021. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 23 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming races for $4,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHACKLEFORD STRONG pressed the pace, assumed command on the turn, drew off for a clear lead and held safely while kept to task. TRY TRY AGAIN lagged while racing outside, found his best stride late, was gaining ground and finished second best. VIOLENT GIGI stalked the pace along the inside, bid between horses on the turn, lacked the needed late response and just held for show. ONE PUTT RICHIE stalked the pace, bid three wide on the turn, lacked a late rally and was outnodded for third. PERFECT WAGER trailed the field, closed well and failed to menace. ICE BLAST put in an even effort in an inside trip and failed to threaten. PAYSTER set the pace to the turn and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Payster
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace to turn, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Ice Blast
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip, even effort, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Wager
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed the field, closed well, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Violent Gigi
ENTRY.OWNER: Contreras Stable Inc and Worden Elizabeth
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, bid between turn, lacked late response, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Shackleford Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, assumed command turn, drew off, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: One Putt Richie
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid 3wide turn, lacked a late rally, outnodded 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Try Try Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged outside, best stride late, gaining, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 5 5 1/2F Turf CR: 95. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,500 (Claiming races for $6,250 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DRAGON DREW set a pressured pace, swung wide leaving the turn, drifted out through the stretch and held under steady urging. EXPROMPT (FR) vied inside, fell back and was taken off the rail, was carried out leaving the turn and through the stretch, went willingly to the wire and couldn't gain ground. REMEMBER THE MAINE was never back, bid inside and failed to respond. STAR OF KODIAK was off slowly, pulled up and vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Exprompt (FR)
ENTRY.OWNER: C J I Phoenix Group and Langdon Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, fell back, taken off rail, carried out turn, stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Star of Kodiak
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Remember the Maine
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, bid inside, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Dragon Drew
ENTRY.COMMENT: swung wide into stretch, drifted out, steady urging, held

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kimberly S. Bradley & William B. Bradley

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 100. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claim ing races for $20,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: W W HOTSHOT set a pressured pace and held under steady urging. LIKE A SALTSHAKER raced close to the pace, couldn't gain despite strong urging and finished second best. BLOW TORCH veered out at the start, raced well off the pace along the inside, closed steadily to narrow the gap and earned show. LYKAN saved ground to the turn, angled out, bid six wide and lacked the needed late response. MALPAIS broke out and was off slowly, rallied three wide on the turn to get within range and came up empty late.

ENTRY.NAME: Lykan
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to turn, angled out, 6wide bid, lacked late response

ENTRY.NAME: Blow Torch
ENTRY.OWNER: JL Racing LLC Kane Mark E and Rosin Coty W
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out start, raced inside, steady close, narrowed gap

ENTRY.NAME: Malpais
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, off slowly, rallied 3w turn, in range, came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: W W Hotshot
ENTRY.OWNER: Ritter Charles W and Becker Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, held under urging

ENTRY.NAME: Like a Saltshaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close, strong urging, couldn't gain, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 7 5 1/2F Turf CR: 90. Claiming Purse 26000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Claiming races for $16,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHE'S WANDAFUL pressed the pace, challenged two across on the turn, dueled to late stretch, drew clear and was all out at the wire. STACK SHACK raced close to the pace, dropped inside on the turn, closed willingly and was gaining fast late. BALI BABY raced close to the pace along the inside, fell back and angled out on the turn, bid five wide, closed well and was gaining late. WAY TOO SMARTE saved ground, angled out into the turn, bid seven wide and finished well. PRINCESS STELLA (IRE) was away alertly, set the pace to the turn, responded when challenged to duel for the lead, was in tight along the rail late, was checked hard and dropped back. RARE ACTION ATTACK broke in, was slow early, closed inside and improved position. MIZZEN ASH was outrun in a dull effort. GET NONE broke out, raced mid pack, went six wide leaving the turn and lacked a stretch response.

ENTRY.NAME: Mizzen Ash
ENTRY.COMMENT: dull effort, outrun, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Way too Smarte
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, angled out into turn, 7wide bid, finished well,

ENTRY.NAME: Bali Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, angled out turn, 5wide bid, closed, gaining fast late

ENTRY.NAME: She's Wandaful
ENTRY.COMMENT: challenged 2across turn, dueled, drew clear late, held

ENTRY.NAME: Get None
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, mid pack, 6wide leaving turn, no stretch response

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Stella (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: led to turn, dueled stretch, in tight rail, checked late

ENTRY.NAME: Rare Action Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, slow early, close inside, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Stack Shack
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close, dropped inside turn,closed willingly, gaining fast late
